# Release Notes

## Panel 2.4.0 (2023-05-27)

### Features / Enhancements

- Migrate to Plugin Tools 1.5.0 (#29)
- Update to Node 18 (#30)

## Panel 2.3.0 (2023-05-21)

### Features / Enhancements

- Update CI and Release Workflows to use setup-node cache (#24)
- Rebuild using 9.5.2 (#25)
- Add testing-library/react (#26)
- Add E2E Cypress testing (#27)
- Update plugin signing and README (#28)

## [Application 2.2.0 (2023-02-16)](/blog/development-templates-2.2.0-20230216/)

### Features / Enhancements

- Update Workflows (#17)
- Rebuild using 9.3.6 (#18)
- Add Application screenshot (#19)

## [Data Source 2.2.0 (2023-02-16)](/blog/development-templates-2.2.0-20230216/)

- Rebuild using 9.3.6 (#19)
- Add Data source image (#20)
